#850001

Caption:

361405 03: (ITALY OUT) Author Stephen King and wife Tabitha arrive at the N.Y. Premiere of "The Green Mile" at the Ziegfeld Theater in New York City, December 8, 1999. "The Green Mile" was adapted from the best-selling Stephen King novel. (photo by Arnaldo Magnani
